statements: SELECT * FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type='inquiry'
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id=1001
SELECT feedback FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type='complaint' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, complaint FROM customer_interactions
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 456 AND interaction_type = 'Inquiry';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, feedback FROM customer_interactions WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL AND complaint IS NULL;
SELECT customer_id, inquiry FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, inquiry, feedback FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('Complaint', 'Feedback') ORDER BY interaction_type, interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 1002;
SELECT id, quality_rating, feedback_date FROM feedback_quality_assurance WHERE quality_rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_quality_assurance WHERE feedback_comments LIKE '%positive%' AND quality_rating >= 4;
SELECT id, inquiry_details FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Inquiry';
SELECT id, customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type, inquiry_details, complaint_details FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT id, customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type, inquiry_details, complaint_details FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Feedback' ORDER BY id ASC;

SELECT ci.id, ci.interaction_date, ci.interaction_type, fqa.quality_rating, fqa.feedback_comments FROM customer_interactions ci JOIN feedback_quality_assurance fqa ON ci.id = fqa.interaction_id WHERE fqa.quality_rating > 3 ORDER BY ci.interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND (inquiry_details LIKE '%refund%' OR complaint_details LIKE '%refund%');

SELECT ci.customer_id, COUNT(fqa.id) AS feedback_count, AVG(fqa.quality_rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_interactions ci LEFT JOIN feedback_quality_assurance fqa ON ci.id = fqa.interaction_id GROUP BY ci.customer_id HAVING COUNT(fqa.id) > 1 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC, feedback_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint';
SELECT * FROM InsuranceInquiries WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_type = 'Suggestion' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_type = 'Survey';
SELECT inquiry_id, customer_id, inquiry_date FROM InsuranceInquiries WHERE inquiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type IN ('Compliment', 'Query') ORDER BY customer_id ASC, interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 1234;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT feedback_rating, feedback_comments FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Complaints WHERE complaint_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Phone Call';
SELECT customer_id, inquiry_date, inquiry_details FROM InsuranceInquiries WHERE inquiry_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(feedback_rating) AS average_rating FROM Feedback;
SELECT * FROM Complaints WHERE complaint_details LIKE '%poor service%' ORDER BY complaint_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, inquiry_topic, inquiry_date FROM TravelInsuranceInquiries WHERE inquiry_topic LIKE '%Cancellation%' ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Complaints WHERE complaint_reason = 'Billing Issue' ORDER BY complaint_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_rating, feedback_comment FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC, feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_rating, feedback_comment FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3 AND feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_description FROM CustomerInteractions JOIN QualityAssurance ON CustomerInteractions.interaction_id = QualityAssurance.interaction_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Call' AND qa_result = 'Pass';

SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_description FROM CustomerInteractions LEFT OUTER JOIN Complaints ON CustomerInteractions.customer_id = Complaints.customer_id WHERE Complaints.complaint_id IS NULL;
SELECT MAX(feedback_rating) AS highest_rating, MIN(feedback_rating) AS lowest_rating, AVG(feedback_rating) AS avg_rating FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-06-30';
